<NEW>

BLACKARACHNIA couldn't just rush over into the ARK past the duo of p=
atrollers, she would be unable to get past without them noticing her via sc=
ent.  She couldn't disable the duo before an alarm was raised - not this cl=
ose to the ARK.

Distractin gthem was also risky, as it would still leave t=
he possibility they might call in a report first, and the ARK was too heavi=
ly armed, and even with many of it's personnel gone, too heavily fortified =
to sneak into if they were on the alert.

Her other options were risky, and=
 put too much to chance..

So, she did what she did best then.

Acted.

Sti=
ll cloaked, she transformed back to her robot mode, with nary a sound.  Art=
fully slinking out of the way, she used an energon blade to slash at her, g=
iving the impressio upon a surface scan she had been badly beaten, damaged,=
 and tortured.  Leaving it upon close inspection to anyone but hopefully a =
field medic that she was on the verge of stasis lock.

Setting an array of =
smoke grenades aobut her to simulate that she had just been tossed..

She w=
ent to fire her retro thrusters in reverse, a pre-recorded 'YEEHAW' from QU=
ICKSTRIKE and the fading sounds of jet engines overhead as she 'slammed' he=
rself down over to the ground with a fading radio message "Here's the garba=
ge back fer ya MAXIES!  Take out the trash fro us!"

Then, smashing hnersel=
f over into the ground like she had been tossed from a great height.

Let t=
he MAXIMAL's compassion be thier weakness, as it always was.

OOC - Hope th=
is leaves the most room for interaction!  Felt the setup was fair and give =
sus a mor einteresting way to go about it rather than her trying to blast o=
r sneak her way in.
